lead_paragraph: “Trump voters playing down the Russian hacking would be apoplectic had Vladimir Putin intervened to help Hillary Clinton,” a reader says.
snippet: “Trump voters playing down the Russian hacking would be apoplectic had Vladimir Putin intervened to help Hillary Clinton,” a reader says....

headline.main: Trump Reacts to Russian Hacking; His Voters Shrug It Off
headline.print_headline: Trump and His Voters React to Hacking
